subtitle: Use this filling in a jacket potato for a really healthy meal!

method.text: Place the vegetables in a saucepan with enough boiling water to just cover. Bring to the boil and simmer for 5 min or until all are tender.
Combine the garlic, sugar, cider vinegar, soy sauce, tomato ketchup and seasoning in a small pan. Gently heat through for 2 min or until sugar has melted.
In a jug, mix together the pineapple juice and cornflour until smooth. Then add to the pan.
Bring to the boil, stirring constantly, and simmer for 3 min or until thickened and clear.
Drain the vegetables thoroughly. Mix into the sauce and divide between the potatoes.

title: Sweet and sour vegetable potato filler
